casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. John P. FELTMAN, Appellant. No. 279. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 8, 1939. Murray Krcindler, of New York City, for appellant. John T. Cahill, U. S. Atty., of New York City (W. Mahlon Dickerson, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel) for the United States.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and PATTERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
